Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for the process segment starting at SW-Reviewer Declined and ending at SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Reviewer Declined when followed by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due in variants where reviewer assignment is delayed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Reviewer across all cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor in variants involving editor reassignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the subsequent SW-Reviewer Unavailable, if any, within the same trace
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Average time it takes SW-AE Assign Reviewers to be executed again after SW-Reviewer Declined in complex reviewer selection loops
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in traces that eventually reach AE recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time of SW-Reviewer Declined relative to the preceding SW-AE Assign Reviewers activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average cycle time of the subprocess: SW-AE Assign Reviewers → SW-Reviewer Declined → SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late in delayed-reviewer-selection variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-EIC Major Revision in cases that undergo major revision after multiple reviewer declines
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
